quotes.quote: The average man, who does not know what to do with his life, wants another one which will last forever.
quotes.author: Anatole France

quotes.quote: The only thing wrong with immortality is that it tends to go on forever.
quotes.author: Herb Caen

quotes.quote: If all else fails, immortality can always be assured by spectacular error.
quotes.author: John Kenneth Galbraith

quotes.quote: Ten thousand fools proclaim themselves into obscurity, while one wise man forgets himself into immortality.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: Seek not, my soul, the life of the immortals; but enjoy to the full the resources that are within thy reach.
quotes.author: Pindar

quotes.quote: The soul of man is immortal and imperishable.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Immortality. I notice that as soon as writers broach this question they begin to quote. I hate quotation. Tell me what you know.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The first condition of immortality is death.
quotes.author: Stanislaw J. Lec

quotes.quote: Millions long for immortality who don't know what to do with themselves on a rainy Sunday afternoon.
quotes.author: Susan Ertz

quotes.quote: I don't want to achieve immortality through my work... I want to achieve it through not dying.
quotes.author: Woody Allen
